room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Shuttle" by Escape Rooms HQ in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Our group tried the Nuclear shuttle room and finished before time ran out. Albert was our game master and was both friendly and helpful. We will be back to try another room soon. Thanks for providing an exciting and challenging experience.

room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Shuttle" by Escape Rooms HQ in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My husband and I decided on the Nuclear Shuttle room and we had so much fun! Couldn't stop talking about it the rest of the day! This was our first escape room and definitely won't be our last. Our game master was awesome at helping when we needed help but didn't give it away either. We still had to work for it and successfully completed the game with 11 minutes to spare! Thanks again for everything ERHQ!

room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Shuttle" by Escape Rooms HQ in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We just completed the Nuclear Shuttle mission and it was amazing! We will be going back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Shuttle" by Escape Rooms HQ in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I took my family and my kid's friends to ERHQ last night in Lewisville and we all had a great time. Emily was our room master and she was really good at nudging us along when we got stuck. Our age ranges were from 10 to 50 and everyone participated in the Nuclear Shuttle Challenge.

room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Shuttle" by Escape Rooms HQ in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We did the Nuclear Shuttle room in Lewisville tonight. Emily was an excellent game master. We will be back!
